attributes.action: We the undersigned call for a referendum for the Re-unification of Ireland
attributes.additional_details:
55% majority in the North of Ireland to remain in European Union
45 % minority to leave the European Union
attributes.background: The EU referendum vote and results to leave the European Union have shown that as well as Scotland the people of the North of Ireland have voted significantly to remain. Therefore it is now clear that along with Scotland we will also be dragged of the European Union against the will of the majority.
